comment.author: 60116708@N04
comment._content: Hello! I wanted to signal you a Photo Award on flickr. The contest is FREE and it have as FIRST PRICE an iPad. Application of Stone in Architecture is the theme of the contest. Partecipants are called to take ispiration from two themes: classic and Green. Classic stands for Classic architecture: pictures to see stone used in more traditional ways, from classical to modern architecture. Green stands for eco-susteinalbe architecture: pictures to portray the use of stone materials in a eco-susteinable environment. The contest is online and is open to people over 18 years old and it's FREE. To partecipate read the contest guide at: www.furrer.it/uk/magazine/if-photo-award.asp Hope you can find it interesting. Good Luck.
